# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your business or lifestyle, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth $8,000 to you at a competitive rate, ensuring you receive maximum value for your investment. Should you have any questions or require further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
